title: Amoebae diversified at least 750 million years ago, far earlier than expected

title_detail.value: Amoebae diversified at least 750 million years ago, far earlier than expected

summary: Reconstitution of Amoebozoa's evolution shows significant Precambrian species diversity. This study changes the view of how life evolved in the very remote past and deepens the understanding of current climate change.

summary_detail.value: Reconstitution of Amoebozoa's evolution shows significant Precambrian species diversity. This study changes the view of how life evolved in the very remote past and deepens the understanding of current climate change.
